item.title: Video Editor for 1-2 Minute Magnate Style Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create captivating magnate-style videos with a duration of 1 to 2 minutes each. The videos will be used for fitness videos.

Here are few samples of what you need to be able to do :
Example 1 : https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/wshg2e7oxiw7bwmqmhx15/Intro-last-longer.mp4?rlkey=4ts7blvrmo40s5joexk1qyu8f&st=xantt6th&dl=0

Example 2 : https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/piwn6hlx2dsu83clsqpph/Testosterone-Foods-Intro.mov?rlkey=r7rsezyclblq0wiju1m40avyu&st=vd6valn1&dl=0

Please add the word ''example'' to your resume to show you've seen what we are looking for..

Specifics :
Duration = The videos will between 1mn and 2mn
Price = Will be 10$ / video
Volume = We'll be need between 15 and 30 / month

The ideal candidate should have a strong eye for detail, creativity, and the ability to bring our vision to life. The videos should be visually stunning, engaging, and well-paced to capture our target audience's attention.

Required skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Ability to add captivating visual effects and transitions
- Experience in color grading and audio synchronization
- Knowledge of video compression and formats
- Strong storytelling and narrative skills



Budget: $10
Posted On: June 24, 2024 10:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Sports Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Video Editor to join our team and work on projects for our sports brand. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and creating high-quality videos that showcase our brand and engage our target audience. Your main tasks will include reviewing raw footage, trimming and rearranging clips, adding transitions and effects, and ensuring the final product meets our brand guidelines.

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as a Video Editor
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and video composition
  - Familiarity with sports content and knowledge of editing techniques for sports-related videos
  - Excellent attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

  If you are passionate about sports and have a knack for storytelling through video editing, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to contribute your skills to a dynamic sports brand.

  Please provide examples of your previous work when applying.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:53 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Video Editing Software - Website - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking to seek a freelancer who has the knowledge and skill set to build and develop a web application video editing software.

I want to discuss everything with you in detail and see if you have any ideas on a web application of this kind.

In a nutshell, here is what I would need:

Import/upload of video file
Add sub titles to video
Flip/Rotate video
Add audio
Audio cutter
Video effects
video filters
Video templates
Reverse videos
Trim/Crop/Cut videos
Change video speed
Zoom
Add loop
Resize video
Add text
Add blur
Remove background/item from video
Remove background sound from video

With video filters and video effects, these are areas  I want to discuss to see what we can add.

I look forward to your reply,
Ashley



Budget: $500
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:47 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development

Skills: Web Application, Desktop Application

item.title: ugc video in Azerbaijani language 100$ - Upwork
item.description:
Self spoken UGC video
Timing: up to 1 minute legth
Language:  Azerbaijani

General conception: UGC about the gaming App

  We need simulation of a live playing
Requirements: Use neutral and emotional tone of voice
Background: To shot the video from Home or from a Car - Self Spoken video, tripod - you have to hold a smartphone with the game  Please, make the video full (one full piece, one shot video) - without cuts! Live commenting on the video, don't use voice over please  You will be provided with the video reference of the similar video  

Important: You’ll be also provided with the video file with the game.  What you have to do is to download the game video to your smartphone and play the video, act like you are playing, comment on the game, add some emotions on it - to make it natural.    

Look at the example video in attached files

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Country: USA

item.title: Videographer MUST BE BASED in Cape Town, South Africa - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and professional videographer who is based in Cape Town, South Africa to capture the beauty and uniqueness of our facility in Cape Town.

Experience in Hospitality Industry is preferred

As a videographer, you will be responsible for creating high-quality videos that showcase our facilities amenities and create an inviting atmosphere for potential guests. Your main tasks will include capturing exterior shots of the facilities, as well as, some personal interviews with the staff and team. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail, excellent lighting and composition skills, and a strong portfolio showcasing their previous work in the hospitality industry.

  Responsibilities:
  - Capture high-quality videos
  - Ensure all shots are well-lit, composed, and showcase the best features of each space
  - Edit and retouch images to enhance their appeal and fit our brand aesthetic
  - Collaborate with our marketing team to ensure images align with our promotional materials

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as a videographer in the hospitality industry
  - Proficiency in using professional videography equipment and editing software
  - Strong attention to detail and ability to capture the essence of each space
  - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Please respond with a link to your portfolios and relevant work

We would like a video comparable to the video as seen on the homepage of https://afkickkliniek.nl/

In your reply, please mention your quote for the total project costs

Hourly Range: $49.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:26 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Drone Videography, Lifestyle, Travel & Hospitality, Business, People, Videography, Camera, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Audio Editing and Video Creation for Selling Online Course (~2 Minute Video) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled audio editor and video creator who can take our recorded audio and transform it into a high-quality video to sell my online course. The ideal candidate will have experience editing audio files, syncing them with visuals, and adding additional graphics or animations to enhance the overall presentation. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are essential. The project includes editing multiple audio files, creating engaging visuals, and adding relevant text or subtitles.
    Skills needed:
    - Audio editing
    - Video creation
    - Syncing audio with visuals
    - Adding graphics and animations
    - Attention to detail

The project will start with me sending you the raw unedited audio file of my voice recording.  It includes me re-reading the same lines several times, so you will need to pick the best takes and use those.  I'll also send some screenshots relevant to the course content which should be included in the video, along with custom animations, pop-up text, etc.  This is a sales video - it has to be engaging!

2 videos will need to be created for this first milestone.  The combined length of the finished videos is probably around 2 - 3 minutes.  If we're both happy working together, there is a potential for additional work editing the actual course content videos.

Budget: $160
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:24 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

    - Attention to detail

The project will start with me sending you the raw unedited audio file of my voice recording.  It includes me re-reading the same lines several times, so you will need to pick the best takes and use those.  I'll also send some screenshots relevant to the course content which should be included in the video, along with custom animations, pop-up text, etc.  This is a sales video - it has to be engaging!

2 videos will need to be created for this first milestone.  The combined length of the finished videos is probably around 2 - 3 minutes.  If we're both happy working together, there is a potential for additional work editing the actual course content videos.

Budget: $160
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:24 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: Voiceover Artist and Script Polisher for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are launching an exciting new YouTube channel that will captivate and educate viewers with engaging and informative content. Our first video is poised to set the tone for our channel and We are seeking a dynamic and skilled voiceover artist who is not only adept at delivering engaging and professional narrations but also has a keen eye for script enhancement. I have attached two drafts of Rough script where you need to review both and make it as a 5 mins script and Give voiceover for the same.

Note: Don't use any AI software or platforms.

Responsibilities:

- Deliver high-quality voiceover recordings for our YouTube channel’s first video.
- Review and refine the provided script to ensure clarity, engagement, and flow.
- Provide constructive feedback and suggestions for script improvements.
- Ensure timely delivery of the final voiceover recording.

Qualifications:

- Proven experience as a voiceover artist with a diverse portfolio.
- Exceptional vocal range and ability to adapt to different tones and styles.
- Strong scriptwriting and editing skills.
- Access to professional recording equipment for high-quality audio output.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Additional Qualifications:

- Previous experience working with YouTube content creators.
- Ability to provide multiple takes and variations of the script if
  needed.
- A demo reel or samples of your previous voiceover work.

Join us in making our YouTube channel's debut unforgettable. We look forward to hearing your voice and seeing how you can enhance our script to create a stellar first impression!

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:24 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Middle-Aged Adult, Voice-Over, Male, Narration, British English Accent, Voice Acting
Skills: Middle-Aged Adult, Voice-Over, Male, Narration, British English Accent, Voice Acting

item.description:
I am starting a TikTok that will explain and teach people about technology and science. I have written 10 scripts and I am looking for someone to create 10 TikTok/Instagram Reels. I am very open to seeing different styles of animation, so please submit a portfolio or a sample of your work. item.title: Experienced Video Editor for YouTube SHORTS - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced video editor to join our team and work on editing videos for our YouTube VLOG. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of YouTube trends and be able to create engaging and visually appealing content. You will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding music and sound effects, creating transitions, and ensuring the final video meets our brand guidelines.
   Skills required:
   - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
   - Strong grasp of storytelling and narrative structure
   - Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work
   - Attention to detail and excellent organizational skills
   - Knowledge of YouTube best practices and trends
   - Experience working with content creators or in the entertainment industry
   If you are passionate about YouTube and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$15.00

item.title: Social Media Video Marketer for Fashion Model - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented social media video marketer to create engaging and viral videos for our fashion model client's Instagram account. As a fashion model, she needs her videos to stand out and attract a large following. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating eye-catching and attention-grabbing videos that go viral. You will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, and editing videos that showcase our client's unique style and personality.

Required Skills:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong knowledge of social media platforms and trends
- Ability to create visually appealing and compelling video content
- Understanding of the fashion industry and the ability to create videos that resonate with the target audience

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 24, 2024 09:15 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Facebook

Country: United States
